description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2f6s1","text":"Command line scripts for processing and analyzing 16S amplicon data using QIIME2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6r7k6","text":"Download conda through the QIIME2 website or miniconda website. After installation, download and install QIIME2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd9se","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hij9","text":"Activate Qiime environment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r9o6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"212u4","text":"conda activate qiime2-amplicon-2023.9 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44ja","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7trf4","text":"# change out to whatever version has been downloaded","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agrmu","text":"Check quality ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dmgg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sh60","text":"qiime demux summarize --p-n 10000 --i-data demux-single-end.qza --o-visualization qual_viz ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6g83b","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p84k","text":"qiime tools view qual_viz.qzv       ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sphu","text":"Denoise with DADA2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jo31","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eaefg","text":"qiime dada2 denoise-single \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nu0p","text":"--i-demultiplexed-seqs demux-single-end.qza \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59bf4","text":"--p-trunc-len 200 \\  #at what position you should trim your data based on the demux summary above ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19dd2","text":"--o-table table.qza \\ #ASV table","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77vkk","text":"--o-representative-sequences rep-sets.qza \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8e5g7","text":"--o-denoising-stats denoising-stats.qza","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mqna","text":"Filter Sequence Table ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"n70","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5m5l0","text":"qiime feature-table summarize \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ot62","text":"\u003e --i-table table.qza \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"315sc","text":"\u003e --o-visualization vis_table","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"252s0","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd3a","text":"qiime tools view vis_table.qzv","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33iji","text":"Align and Construct Phylogenetic Tree","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ha72","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5g3go","text":"qiime phylogeny align-to-tree-mafft-fasttree \\    # program used for construction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9sdva","text":"--i-sequences rep-sets.qza \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67pbu","text":"--o-alignment aligned-rep-seqs.qza \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26rjf","text":"--o-masked-alignment masked-aligned-rep-seqs.qza \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n46c","text":"--o-tree unrooted-tree.qza \\","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ir86","text":"--o-rooted-tree rooted-tree.qza","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dp9gb","text":"Compute diversity measures (see QIIME2 for differences in alpha, beta, and emperor plots)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dib1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b82vc","text":"qiime diversity core-metrics-phylogenetic --i-table
table.qza --i-phylogeny rooted-tree.qza --p-sampling-depth 29761
--m-metadata-file /Users/isabellalivingston/Desktop/16S Sequence
Data/GSL_metadata.txt --o-rarefied-table rare_featuretable --o-faith-pd-vector
faithpd_vector --o-observed-features-vector observed_sample_features_vector
--o-shannon-vector shannon_sample_vector --o-evenness-vector
evenness_sample_vector --o-unweighted-unifrac-distance-matrix
unweighted_distance_matrix --o-weighted-unifrac-distance-matrix
weighted_distance_matrix --o-jaccard-distance-matrix jaccard_matrix
--o-bray-curtis-distance-matrix bc_matrix --o-unweighted-unifrac-pcoa-results
unweighted_pcoa --o-weighted-unifrac-pcoa-results weighted_pcoa
--o-jaccard-pcoa-results jaccard_pcoa --o-bray-curtis-pcoa-results bc_pcoa
--o-unweighted-unifrac-emperor unweighted_emperor --o-weighted-unifrac-emperor
weighted_emperor --o-jaccard-emperor jaccard_emperor --o-bray-curtis-emperor
bc_emperor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
